title: Pre-UFYB 2: Chill Pill: How to Immediately Relieve Anxiety
itunes:title: Pre-UFYB 2: Chill Pill: How to Immediately Relieve Anxiety
description:
On this episode, we delve into two different levels of working with anxiety – the physical sensation in your body and the thoughts that are causing that feeling. Tune in as I share a two-part “chill pill” for relieving anxiety immediately, an exercise that will help to calm your physical sensations and a practice that will allow you to explore your thoughts and eliminate worry quickly.

Get full show notes and get more information here: http://bit.ly/2o8ZMeT
